code: import{types}from"./types";const initialTaskState=[];export default function tasksReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialTaskState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.ADD_TASK:return[...state,action.payload];default:return state;}}const initialCategoriesState=['Work','Personal','Other'];export const categoriesReducer=(state,action)=>{return state;};
